# domain

**Instance Property**

A string containing the error domain.

## Declaration

```swift
readonly attribute String domain;
```

## Discussion

See [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/tvmljs/tverror/error_domains] for a list of domains.

## Getting Error Properties

- **code**: The error code.
- **description**: A string containing the description of the error.
- **userInfo**: The user info dictionary.

items.description: A string containing the description of the error.
